    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CatalogPortalSettingsMigration</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>After Madrid, Catalog Item has portal settings. The script will help to migrate the following Item level settings for use_sc_layout=false to portal settings

No cart -> Hide 'Add to Cart'
No quantity -> Hide Quantity

Usage: 
var standardUpdate = true;  
// true: Call business rules on catalog item table and send changes to updateset.
//false[DEFAULT]: Business rules on catalog item table will be skipped and no updateset changes
var psMigration = new CatalogPortalSettingsMigration();
psMigration.migrate(standardUpdate);
</description>
        <name>CatalogPortalSettingsMigration</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CatalogPortalSettingsMigration = Class.create();
CatalogPortalSettingsMigration.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	migrate: function(standardUpdate) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
		gr.setWorkflow(standardUpdate);
		gr.query();
		while (gr.next()) {
			var updated = false;
			if (gr.no_cart == true) {
				updated = true;
				gr.no_cart_v2 = gr.no_cart;
			}
			if (gr.no_quantity == true) {
				updated = true;
				gr.no_quantity_v2 = gr.no_quantity;
			}
			if (updated)
				gr.update();
		}
	},
    type: 'CatalogPortalSettingsMigration'
};]]></script>
